meanings.sent1: The team triumphed in the championship game.
meanings.sent2: She triumphed over her fear of public speaking.
meanings.sent3: The cat triumphed over the laser pointer, thinking it had caught a real mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun triumphed over the clouds, shining brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The hero triumphed over the villain, saving the day with courage.

meanings.definition: To rejoice or exult in success or victory
meanings.sent1: The students triumphed after acing their exams.
meanings.sent2: He triumphed with joy when he received the promotion.
meanings.sent3: The dog triumphed with glee when it found its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers triumphed in the garden, blooming beautifully in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The child triumphed with laughter and happiness on the playground.
